name: LQZ Cold Press Juicer, Slow Masticating Juicer Machines, 350W Juice Extractor Machine, 5.3" Large Bore Feed Chute Fit Whole Vegetables and Fruits, Easy to Clean Juicer(Black)
about_this_item: 【Easy and Safe to Operate】Our masticating juicer comes with a large 5.3-inch feed chute with a blade-less design that stops the machine when the lid is opened. It not only improves juicing efficiency, but also ensures safety!

【50rpm Slow Grinding Technology】Our cold press juicer, through the multi-stage extrusion technology, low-speed slow squeezing technology, can effectively reduce the damage to the cell structure of the fruit in the process of juicing, reduce the heat generation and oxidation, so as to retain more nutrients and the original flavor of the fruit.

【Multifunctional and Efficient】 This 350W masticating juicer comes with a food-grade auger head that handles a wide range of vegetable and fruit, a dual-layer filter that separates the pulp for a smoother texture, and a juice yield of 99 percent.
【Easy to Clean】Our all-in-one cold press juicer has only three parts and comes with a special cleaning brush for quick assembly, disassembly and cleaning!

【Troubleshooting Steps】1.When installing the cold press juicer, make sure that the handle is perfectly aligned with the position of the on button.2.Insert the Spiral Grinding Head into the bottom and rotate counterclockwise to ensure that the Spiral Grinding Head is fully seated on the motor shaft.3.You should make sure that the cover is pressed down tightly.After confirming that the above steps are correct and the cover is tightly closed, try to turn on the device again.

title: Amazing Juicer
content: Recently my juicer at home broke so I had to buy a new one.  I came across this product and decided to buy it because it was really pretty.  Typical juicers don't look very pleasing to look at, but this one does.  Even though it is pleasing to the eye, it is a very strong juicer.  I love my new juicer because it blends everything well without having to cut the fruit or vegetables into smaller chunks and the juice comes out like little to no pulp.  This is great for juice lovers like me!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I recently purchased the LQZ Cold Press Juicer and it has exceeded my expectations in every way. The 5.3" large bore feed chute is a game-changer, allowing me to fit whole fruits and vegetables without the tedious task of chopping them up. The 350W motor is powerful yet remarkably quiet, delivering smooth and nutrient-rich juice every time.One of the standout features is how easy it is to clean; the parts come apart effortlessly and are dishwasher safe, which makes the entire process quick and hassle-free. The sleek black design also adds a modern touch to my kitchen. Overall, this juicer offers exceptional performance and convenience, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enjoy fresh, homemade juice with minimal effort. Highly recommend!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2024

title: Exceptional Performance and Convenience – A Top-Notch Juicer!
